title: macbook pro OSX problem  (need help)
body:
So today in a ranked game, had 900 ping, which forced me to disconnect, and then i couldn't reconnect.
Restarted internet, internet was a bit faster.
But now, i can't join ANY games. Not custom, co-op vs ai, or normal games.
When i start the game, instead of having the champion loading screen, i have a black screen, forcing me to cntrl + opt + escape, and when i tab, the client says "You have left the game... Reconnect" 

I've repaired client, restarted computer and internet multiple times, to no avail. 
Anyone have tips/ experiencing same thing? (I've already sent ticket to rito)

replies.body: My game will crash since last night. Nothing changed on my side. Just have a feeling that the OCE server has its period.
Have you recently updated your video drivers?
